price: 63. Jie tarė: „Ne, mes atėjome pas tave su tuo (kančia), dėl ko jie abejojo.“
arabic: قَالُواْ بَلۡ جِئۡنَٰكَ بِمَا كَانُواْ فِيهِ يَمۡتَرُونَ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qālū bal ji'nāka bimā kānū fīhi yamtarūna
